name: Therapeutics
description: Research focussing on finding a novel and existing drug to use for treatment

name: Vaccines
description: Research focussing on the development of a vaccine for SARS-CoV-2, MERS-CoV or SARS-CoV

name: Clinical Trials
description: Research discussing the results of a clinical trial

name: Diagnostics
description: Research discussing methods to identify patients with different viruses, using molecular biology, imaging or clinical techniques

name: Molecular Biology
description: Research investigating the biological underpinnings of the viruses and their interactions with the human body

name: Transmission
description: Research investigating the modes of transmissions for the viruses

name: Patient Reports
description: Reports of individual patients and cohorts that may provide insight into symptoms and clinical outcomes

name: Disease Modelling
description: Reports of individual patients and cohorts that may provide insight into symptoms and clinical outcomes

name: Reviews
description: Review articles that summarise existing research on a virus, or a specific subtopic of the virus
